localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Turn your event, community or workspace into a true networking opportunity by providing attendees a quick and easy way to discover and connect each other, online and in-person.
nodes.title: Orbit Connect - Easy networking for hybrid events, communities & workspaces.
nodes.author: Oliver Waters

nodes.excerpt: Indie Worldwide is an online meetup group for indie makers and founders from around the world. We host monthly meetups, webinars, and a super supportive and active Slack group. See you there! ğŸŒğŸŒğŸŒ
nodes.title: Indie Worldwide - Virtual events with indie founders from around the world
nodes.author: Anthony Castrio

nodes.excerpt: Spot is a virtual office loaded with the collaboration and communication functionality a high-performing team needs: voice and video, screen-sharing, and chat all at the team's fingertips.
nodes.title: Spot - The virtual hub for your organization
nodes.author: Gordon Hempton

nodes.excerpt: Coffee Chats is a no-code platform that lets you build a website that is connected with your Google Calendar, making it super easy to host free or paid virtual coffee chats, meetings and consulting calls (think Calendly meets Carrd in one free app).
nodes.title: Coffee Chats - If Calendly and Carrd had a baby
nodes.author: Chris Tung

nodes.excerpt: Auditoriums on Pluto.video let you host talks and events in 3D worlds! - Look around and feel the presence of the crowd - Naturally transition between talks and socializing with attendees - Gather your community around shared interests and create serendipity
nodes.title: Pluto Auditorium - Virtual events that feel like the real world
nodes.author: Katsuya

nodes.title: Swag Fair - Sustainable swag made by small businesses
nodes.author: Artiom Dashinsky

nodes.excerpt: Get 100 new paying customers in 100 days. That's it. That's the challenge.
nodes.title: 100 in 100 Challenge - Get 100 new paid users in 100 days
nodes.author: Anthony Castrio

nodes.excerpt: Social media (and PH) are great places to share content, but it's hard to foster new relationships. We built Luma to help your community deepen relationships with events, newsletters, member profiles.
nodes.title: Luma - Foster meaningful relationships with events and newsletters
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: T-Minus is one of the best and most feature packed space launch tracking apps that gives you access to space related information, launches, events, news, rockets, agencies and more. Follow your favorite space agencies such as SpaceX, Rocket Lab, ULA and more.
nodes.title: T-Minus - Track SpaceX, NASA, ULA, Rocket Lab & other launches
nodes.author: Andrei Blaj

nodes.excerpt: Branch is your space for work and play! â € Bring back serendipity, spontaneous conversations, hallway bump-ins, watercooler chats and so much more that's missing in remote work with the collaborative and fun virtual HQ.
nodes.title: Branch 2.0 - Your space for work and play
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Highlight your Clubhouse event in social media. Paste the link of your event, and get a neat preview page you can share online.
nodes.title: Flipp for Clubhouse - Highlight your Clubhouse event on social media
nodes.author: Boris Lepikhin

nodes.author: Dmitry Yeremin

nodes.excerpt: This MVP version helps users to discover interesting events based on a smart tags system and user proximity. The Housely app provides event hosts with a solution for scheduling and organizing club events, in an easy-to-use way.
nodes.title: Housely club - Clubhouse events schedule and browsing app
nodes.author: Vladimir Yancharuk

nodes.excerpt: Track important tasks and projects, create upcoming events, keep notes and control expenses in one notion table. You can quickly find your to-do list or see how much money you spent last week.
nodes.title: Magic Board for Notion - Organize your entire life with one board
nodes.author: Damir Bektilov

nodes.excerpt: Goodbye, generic video chat! Virtual Venue lets you embed a branded virtual event space directly into your website. Instead of a hard-to-find Zoom link, create a persistent home where your community can gather.
nodes.title: Virtual Venue by Mixily - Host custom video gatherings right in your website
nodes.author: Andrew Badr

nodes.excerpt: You probably have a few social media accounts... We built Luma to be your home online, between the big networks. Share your Luma to connect with your audience, showcase your content, and make money.
nodes.title: Luma Profile - A homepage for creators to showcase their content
nodes.author: Victor Pontis

nodes.excerpt: Plan the things you love to do with your friends both online and in person. Make plans with friends, share plans, see what others are up to, and keep track of upcoming events. Plan get-togethers, brunch, study sessions, your next date, you name it!
nodes.title: Planmesh - The easiest way to plan with friends
nodes.author: Jose Togbe

nodes.excerpt: A curated collection of all product management and UX conferences in 2021. Search by name or filter by a month/location (including Virtual conferences).
nodes.title: Product & UX Conferences - A curated list of product management and UX conferences
nodes.author: Ahmed Sulaiman
